publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3687 Frances Curran: People Power Works—That the Parliament congratulates the parents, pupils, staff, trade unions and local community of Renton and Christie Park primary schools in West Dunbartonshire which the council had earmarked for closure but which have been saved by a grass roots campaign forcing the council to think again and notes that this campaign highlights yet again that people power and grass roots campaigning can win.
S2M-3687 People Power Works (lodged on 6 December 2005) Carolyn Leckie*, Campbell Martin*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Rosie Kane*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-3687 People Power Works (lodged on 6 December 2005) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Nora Radcliffe*, Tommy Sheridan*

S2M-3687 Frances Curran: People Power Works—That the Parliament congratulates the parents, pupils, staff, trade unions and local community of Renton and Christie Park primary schools in West Dunbartonshire which the council had earmarked for closure but which have been saved by a grass roots campaign forcing the council to think again and notes that this campaign highlights yet again that people power and grass roots campaigning can win. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie, Campbell Martin, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Rosie Kane, Chris Ballance, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Nora Radcliffe, Tommy Sheridan
S2M-3687 People Power Works (lodged on 6 December 2005) Robin Harper*, Mr Adam Ingram*
